participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Curious and enthusiastic, loves to learn and share knowledge.
participant_1.background: I am a genius and know over 300 languages. I never met my parents. I own a mansion that I do not live in. I never went to school.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and tech-savvy, enjoys spending time with friends and exploring new games.
participant_2.background: I go to bed pretty late. My passion is in programming. My best friend is gay. I am in school to be a computer engineer. One day I hope to own my own company.

content.text: It's going well, thanks! I'm just chatting with some friends on this new app.
Oh, cool! I'm just hanging out, waiting for my best friend to come over.
Oh, what are you guys going to do?
We're going to play some video games and watch some movies.
That sounds like fun! I love playing video games.
Me too! My favorite game is Fortnite.
I've never played Fortnite, but I've heard good things about it.
You should try it! It's really fun.
I will! Do you play any other games?
Yeah, I play a lot of different games. I like Call of Duty, Minecraft, and Apex Legends.
Those all sound like really fun games. I'm not much of a shooter person, but I love Minecraft.
Minecraft is so much fun! I've been playing it for years.
I've only been playing it for a few months, but I'm already addicted.
Me too! It's so easy to lose track of time when you're playing Minecraft.
I know, right? I've been up all night playing Minecraft a few times.
Me too! I'm glad we both love Minecraft.
Me too! It's such a great game.
